long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabsGather is a simple but powerful Chrome extension that allows you to save all your opened tabs (in all Chrome windows) as bookmarks in an easy manner. Just click the icon next to your URL bar. Your tabs are saved to a folder (with the current date as it's name) located in Other Bookmarks --> TabsGather. It is especially helpful when you are in a hurry, but want to continue your work later.
